text: Saxton is an unincorporated community in Buchanan County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Saxton was established in 1872, and remained in operation until 1938. The community was named after Albe M. Saxton, the original owner of the town site. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Buchanan County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Saxton, Missouri
